A

allTilesClass - Class in demolition
 
allTilesClass(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.allTilesClass
 
App - Class in demolition
This serves as the core manager for the game and functionality which calls upon other classes and extends PApplet.
App() - Constructor for class demolition.App
Constructor which will initialise the board, bombList, boardArrayTime, boardArrayName, pathTimeMap, and currentBoard which are used in the game.

B

block - Variable in class demolition.allTilesClass
 
Board - Class in demolition
Sets up the backend of the board in a String[][] format which stores the location of all tiles and enemies.
Board() - Constructor for class demolition.Board
 
Bomb - Class in demolition
Extends from GameObject class to create a bomb which will tick for 2 seconds before exploding.
Bomb(int, int, PApplet, String[][]) - Constructor for class demolition.Bomb
Takes in the x and y coordinates of the player and currentBoard as well as PApplet app which will be used to find the positioning of the bomb on the map and determine its explosion.
BrokenWall - Class in demolition
Creates the BrokenWall class which is used to create brokenWall objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
BrokenWall(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.BrokenWall
Constructs the object given the x and y coordinates as well as loading the image from the resources folder.

C

changeLives(int) - Method in class demolition.App
 
changeOrientation(int) - Method in class demolition.PlayerClasses
Forcelly change the character orientation (used for testing purposes)
checkGameState() - Method in class demolition.App
Checks whether the red or yellow enemies are on the same tile as the player.

D

demolition - package demolition
 
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.allTilesClass
 
draw() - Method in class demolition.App
Combines the methods and logic from the other classes to build the core game as well as render in graphics.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Bomb
Draws the bomb sprite and changes the sprite based on the time elapsed.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Player
 
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.redEnemy
Draws the image in the Sprite list given the orientation and imagetick as well as the X and Y coordinates.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.timer
Draws the timerIcon as well as the playerIcon which is at the top of the game window.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.yellowEnemy
 
drawExplosion(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Bomb
Draws the explosion sprites depending on the value in the int array from the setCanExplodePath method.

E

EmptyWall - Class in demolition
Creates the EmptyWall class which is used to create emptyWall objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
EmptyWall(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.EmptyWall
Constructs the object given the x and y coordinates as well as loading the image from the resources folder.
explode(int, int, App) - Method in class demolition.Bomb
Checks the given coordinates and depending on the tile will either change to " ", do nothing or change booleans isEnemyDead or killedPlayer to true.
explosion(App) - Method in class demolition.Bomb
Calls the explode function for each tile.
explosionBreakBlock(String[][], PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Board
Breaks the necessary blocks when an explosion occurs by clearing all objects in the emptyWalls and brokenWalls lists and re-adding them after scanning through the newly formed current board

F

FPS - Static variable in class demolition.App
 

G

GameObject - Class in demolition
The GameObject class is the main abstract class which will be inherited from by the PlayerClasses and the allTilesClass for the X and Y coordinates as well as universal getter methods for X and Y
GameObject(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.GameObject
Takes in the x and y coordinates and stores it in protected variables in the class attributes

getPathTimeHashMap() - Method in class demolition.readJsonObject

Creates the GoalTile class which is used to create GoalTile objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
GoalTile(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.GoalTile
Constructs the object given the x and y coordinates as well as loading the image from the resources folder.

K

keyPressed() - Method in class demolition.App
Determines if a significant key has been pressed and will allow the player to act accordingly.
keyReleased() - Method in class demolition.App
Changes the value of boolean keyReleased to true once a key has been let go.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class demolition.App
 
makeBoard(String, PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Board
Reads the file taken from the config.json and converts it to a String[][] which will be used to store the current board.
map(String[][], PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Board
Creates Player, redEnemy, yellowEnemy, and tile blocks based on the String[][] board created in the makeBoard method and adds them to their respective Lists in the board attributes.
movementDOWN() - Method in class demolition.PlayerClasses
Shifts character location Down
movementLeft() - Method in class demolition.PlayerClasses
Shifts the character location to the left
movementRight() - Method in class demolition.PlayerClasses
Shifts character location to the right
movementUP() - Method in class demolition.PlayerClasses
Shifts character location up
moveRedEnemyAI(redEnemy) - Method in class demolition.App
 
moveYellowEnemy(yellowEnemy) - Method in class demolition.App
Moves yellow enemy in a set pattern that is clockwise.

newX - Variable in class demolition.PlayerClasses
 
newY - Variable in class demolition.PlayerClasses
 
notAlive() - Method in class demolition.Bomb
 

O

orientation - Variable in class demolition.PlayerClasses
 

P

Player - Class in demolition
Contains attributes which stores the images for each animation in each direction.
Player(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.Player
Takes in the x and y coordinates of the object and loads in the respective images for each direction.
PlayerClasses - Class in demolition
This abstract class will be inherited from for each entity that is either a player or an enemy.
PlayerClasses(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.PlayerClasses
 

R

readFiles(String) - Method in class demolition.readJsonObject
Takes in a filePath String parameter and uses a scanner to append each Line to the fileRead variable.
readJsonObject - Class in demolition
Class which will read from a JSON file and extract information based on levels, lives and time and put values into a HashMap which will be used for map loading.
readJsonObject() - Constructor for class demolition.readJsonObject
 
redEnemy - Class in demolition
Creates the redEnemy object which extends the PlayerClasses and implements the playerMovement interface.
redEnemy(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.redEnemy
Takes in X and Y and PApplet app to create a redEnemy object which inherits methods from PlayerClasses.
resetGame() - Method in class demolition.App
Resets the game to the original board by clearing out red and yellow enemy lists, as well as redrawing board from text file and resetting timer.

S

setCanExplodePath() - Method in class demolition.Bomb
Checks 2 blocks in each direction N, E, S, W and determines how far the explosion should occur in.
settings() - Method in class demolition.App
Sets the size of the game window
setup() - Method in class demolition.App
Calls upon the readJsonObject class to read text input from a JSONObject, extracting the lives data and time data.
SolidWall - Class in demolition
Creates the SolidWall class which is used to create SolidWall objects that can be stored in an ArrayList for populating the board.
SolidWall(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.SolidWall
Constructs the object given the x and y coordinates as well as loading the image from the resources folder.
sprites - Variable in class demolition.Player
 
sprites - Variable in class demolition.PlayerClasses
 

T

testMakeBoard(String, PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Board
A makeBoard method which is used for testing purposes.
tick() - Method in class demolition.PlayerClasses
Predominantly used for cycling through player and enemy animations.
tick() - Method in class demolition.redEnemy
Has a timer which ticks up every time tick is called which resets at 12 and adds 1 to the imageTick to change the redEnemy animation.
tick() - Method in class demolition.timer
Every 60 ticks leads to the time -1 as there is 60FPS.
timer - Class in demolition
Creates the timer class which loads the images as well as keeps track of the game time.
timer(int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.timer
Takes in an int for timer which is loaded from the config.kson and the PApplet app.

W

WIDTH - Static variable in class demolition.App

x - Variable in class demolition.GameObject
 

Y

yellowEnemy - Class in demolition
Creates the yellowEnemy object which inherits attributes from the playerClasses class for tick().
yellowEnemy(int, int, PApplet) - Constructor for class demolition.yellowEnemy
